text: Ni tachichinjidwa aŵala ŵaŵan’jogwepe M’mbuje gwao (Allah) wa ku Mbepo ali mikutula-mikutula, mpaka pandema jatachijiyika, ni jichiugulidwa milango jakwe (ŵanganyao nkanakopochele), ni tachasalila ŵanganyao akujichengeta ŵakwe (mwakwakalibuchisya): “Ntendele uŵe kukwenu! M’bele ŵambone (pa itendo ni iŵecheto yenu, mwanti sengwagani), basi jijinjilani (Mbepo), tim’be ŵandamo (mwalakwemo).”
